title: Multimodal Mathematical Storytelling through Small-Group Collaboration

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and proficiency in fundamental smartphone usage
context.additional_context: Teaching competency enhancement program for preservice or in-service teachers, involving projects to convert math concepts into multimodal content in smartphone-based limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners can represent math problem-solving processes in three stages (text-image-animation) through small-group collaboration
Learners can implement mathematical concepts as visual storytelling using digital tools (smartphone apps)
Learners can evaluate the educational effectiveness of multimodal creations through a peer feedback system

resources: Offline Group Activity Kit (Sketchbook, Colored Pencils)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
